dreameditor.js (Code Editor)
Create & edit code in a web browser.

dreameditor.js Features:
Free & Open Source
Light & Dark mode
Line Numbers
Option to highlight active line
Supports Multiple File Types
Supports Browser Zoom Controls
Save to & load from local storage
Full desktop & mobile support
Small application size
Syntax Highlighting
Various syntax modes are included.

This project purpose is to provide a easy accessible platform to edit documents in a web browser. For more information about dreameditor.js or to download the latest open source build visit dreameditorjs.org
